pageContent: Purpose: Men with a family history of prostate cancer are at higher risk for prostate cancer. There are conflicting data regarding the impact of hereditary forms of prostate cancer on long-term outcomes after radical prostatectomy. We examined the impact of familial and hereditary prostate cancer treatment in the prostate specific antigen era.

metaData.source:
Updates in advanced prostate cancer 2018
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30279577/
